description: Kuzuki Kakyou is dreamseer in a permanent coma, who appears as a tall man with golden eyes. His ability to see the future in dreams was discovered at an early age and for this he was imprisoned by some unknown political group. Having never seen the outside world, he drew Sumeragi Hokuto into his dreams and fell in love with her after she showed him the sea through her imagination. However, he foresaw her death at the hands of the Sakurazukamori and tried to save her by breaking out of his room. He was shot by one of the guards and failed to reach Hokuto in time to save her, and has remained in a coma ever since. Subsequently, he meets Monou Kotori in his dreams, but becomes associated with the Dragons of Earth, manipulating Princess Hinoto`s dreams to their ends.
name: Kuzuki Kakyou
